hero.title: Master Solana Development
hero.subtitle: From zero to deploying production-ready dApps. Interactive courses, on-chain credentials, and a community of builders.

features.title: Everything you need to become a Solana developer

interactive.title: Interactive Coding
interactive.description: Write, test, and deploy Solana programs directly in your browser with real-time feedback.

credentials.title: On-Chain Credentials
credentials.description: Earn soulbound NFTs that prove your skills. Verifiable on-chain, visible in your wallet.

xp.title: XP & Leveling
xp.description: Earn XP tokens for every lesson. Track your progress and compete on the leaderboard.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Learn with builders from across Latin America and beyond. Open-source and forkable.

paths.title: Learning Paths
paths.subtitle: Structured tracks to take you from beginner to expert

cta.title: Ready to build on Solana?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers learning to build the future of finance.

testimonials.title: Loved by Builders
testimonials.subtitle: See what developers are saying about Superteam Academy

1.quote: The interactive coding challenges made learning Anchor so much easier. I deployed my first program in a week.
1.name: Lucas M.

2.quote: On-chain credentials are a game changer. I can prove my skills directly from my wallet.
2.name: Ana R.

3.quote: Best structured Solana learning path I've found. The XP system keeps me motivated.
3.name: Pedro S.

auth.walletRequired: Connect a wallet to enroll in courses and receive credentials.
auth.linkWalletDescription: To access all features, link a Solana wallet to your account.
auth.linkBenefitXpDesc: Receive soulbound XP tokens on-chain as you learn.
auth.linkBenefitNftsDesc: Mint credential and achievement NFTs to showcase your skills.
auth.linkBenefitOwnershipDesc: Your credentials live on Solana — portable and verifiable forever.

onboarding.walletGuideStep2: Click 'I need a new wallet' and set a password
onboarding.walletGuideStep3: Write down your recovery phrase on paper
onboarding.walletGuideStep3Warning: Never share this phrase. Never store it digitally.
